segments.text: I notice the woman is so focused on that plate she’s drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t even see the water spilling all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but laugh at how oblivious she is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky with that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they do this often.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really risking it with that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so innocent, just waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman would be shocked if she turned around right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole thing is like a silent comedy skit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t look away, even though I know I should probably stop watching.
segments.speaker: PAR
